title: Evolution of feline immunodeficiency virus in Felidae: Implications for human health and wildlife ecology
text: Molecular genetic tools are informative in evaluating emerging pathogens and provide essential information such as pathogen identification, association of particular or novel strains with disease outbreaks, mutational changes leading to increased or decreased pathogenesis, and geographic and/or evolutionary origins of the pathogen
